entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Hunters Point
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind becoming north 30 km/h overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
